subject: Shipping to Slovenia - Pro X Ultra pedals
description_text:
Hello,

I'm looking to purchase your Pro X Ultra pedals, and I'm wondering how the shipping goes. I'm from Slovenia, so will there be any taxes/duties I will need to pay on my end? And if so, do you maybe know how much that would be?

Thank you in advance!
Looking forward to your answer and have a great rest of your day.

- Miha Podobnik

conversations.body_text: Hi Miha Podobnik,    We ship from our German warehouse with no taxes or fees. However, the Pro X Ultra baseplate is currently out of stock and may take 3-5 days to restock. You may proceed with your purchase, and we will prioritize your order for shipment.

Hello, I forgot to respond to your response as work was hectic. I just purchased the pedals on your site. Order number: #SSN2955, do you mind checking if the base plate is in stock already?

Thank you in advance!
Looking forward to your answer and have a great rest of your day.

- Miha Podobnik
Hi Miha Podobnik,    Yes, your parcel has been dispatched via DHL Express. Here is your tracking link:  https://www.dhl.com/us-en/home/tracking.html?tracking-id=CE326628255DE

Thats amazing to hear :) Cant wait to set them up :))

Thank you and have a great rest of your day!
- Miha Podobnik

Sent from [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/mail/home) for Android.

-------- Original Message --------
